There is no local transport or taxi service, but you can easily walk everywhere on foot. Or you can borrow a bicycle near the pond and start of singletrack trails. However the fee is quite high as they are borrowing high-quality mountain bikes, c. 500 Kč/day.

Nové Město pod Smrkem is a good starting point for hiking and cycling in Jizera mountains. Because it's not well-known, you can enjoy hiking/cycling in the nature without meeting many people. It's also possible to go corss-countrying, but be prepared for going upwards a lot before reaching the main mountain range.
